Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Annotation Types

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.blobstore.support.AbstractLegacyBlobContainer
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.AndQueryBuilder
    Use BoolQueryBuilder instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.AndQueryParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.codec.postingsformat.BloomFilterPostingsFormat
    only for reading old segments
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.search.function.BoostScoreFunction
    org.elasticsearch.index.search.child.ChildrenConstantScoreQuery
    Use queries from lucene/join instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.search.child.ChildrenQuery
    Use queries from lucene/join instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.CompressedIndexInput
    Used only for backward comp. to read old compressed files, since we now use codec based compression
    org.elasticsearch.action.count.CountAction
    use the search api with size 0 rather than the count api, namely SearchAction instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.count.CountRequest
    use SearchRequest instead and set the size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.action.count.CountRequestBuilder
    use SearchRequestBuilder instead and set size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.action.count.CountResponse
    use the search api with size 0 rather than the count api, namely SearchResponse instead.
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.decider.DisableAllocationDecider
    In favour for EnableAllocationDecider.
    org.elasticsearch.index.codec.postingsformat.Elasticsearch090PostingsFormat
    only for reading old segments
    org.elasticsearch.action.exists.ExistsRequest
    use SearchRequest instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.action.exists.ExistsRequestBuilder
    use SearchRequestBuilder instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.action.exists.ExistsResponse
    use SearchRequest instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.factor.FactorBuilder
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.functionscore.factor.FactorParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.FilteredQueryBuilder
    Use BoolQueryBuilder instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.FilteredQueryParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.FQueryFilterParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.translog.LegacyTranslogReader
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.LimitQueryBuilder
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.setTerminateAfter(int) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.LimitQueryParser
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.lzf.LZFCompressedIndexInput
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.lzf.LZFCompressor
    Use DeflateCompressor instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MissingQueryBuilder
    Use ExistsQueryBuilder inside a BoolQueryBuilder.mustNot(QueryBuilder) clause instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.NotQueryBuilder
    Use BoolQueryBuilder.mustNot(QueryBuilder) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.OrQueryBuilder
    Use BoolQueryBuilder instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.OrQueryParser
    org.elasticsearch.index.search.child.ParentConstantScoreQuery
    use queries from lucene/join instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.search.child.ParentQuery
    Use queries from lucene/join instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryFilterBuilder
    Useless now that queries and filters are merged: pass the query as a filter directly.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryFilterParser
    org.elasticsearch.rest.action.exists.RestExistsAction
    use RestSearchAction instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.rest.action.admin.indices.alias.get.RestGetIndicesAliasesAction
    org.elasticsearch.index.analysis.SnowballAnalyzer
    (3.1) Use the language-specific analyzer in modules/analysis instead. This analyzer WAS removed in Lucene 5.0
    org.elasticsearch.index.translog.Translog.DeleteByQuery
    Delete-by-query is removed in 2.0, but we keep this so translog can replay on upgrade.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.DeleteByQueryFailedEngineException
    Delete-by-query is removed in 2.0, but we keep this so translog can replay on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.script.expression.ExpressionScriptCompilationException
    just for backwards compatibility
    org.elasticsearch.script.expression.ExpressionScriptExecutionException
    just for backwards compatibility
    org.elasticsearch.script.groovy.GroovyScriptCompilationException
    for back compat only
    org.elasticsearch.script.groovy.GroovyScriptExecutionException
    for back compat only
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.inject.assistedinject.AssistedInject
    FactoryProvider now works better with the standard @Inject annotation. When using that annotation, parameters are matched by name and type rather than by position. In addition, values that use the standard @Inject constructor annotation are eligible for method interception.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.elasticsearch.indices.cache.request.IndicesRequestCache.DEPRECATED_INDEX_CACHE_REQUEST_ENABLED
    org.elasticsearch.indices.cache.query.IndicesQueryCache.DEPRECATED_INDICES_CACHE_QUERY_SIZE
    org.elasticsearch.indices.cache.request.IndicesRequestCache.DEPRECATED_INDICES_CACHE_QUERY_SIZE
    org.elasticsearch.indices.recovery.RecoverySettings.INDICES_RECOVERY_MAX_SIZE_PER_SEC
    org.elasticsearch.script.ScriptService.SCRIPT_FILE
    Use ScriptService.ScriptType.getParseField() instead. This should be removed in 2.0
    org.elasticsearch.script.ScriptService.SCRIPT_ID
    Use ScriptService.ScriptType.getParseField() instead. This should be removed in 2.0
    org.elasticsearch.script.ScriptService.SCRIPT_INLINE
    Use ScriptService.ScriptType.getParseField() instead. This should be removed in 2.0
    org.elasticsearch.script.ScriptService.SCRIPT_LANG
    Use Script.ScriptField instead. This should be removed in 2.0
    org.elasticsearch.common.network.NetworkUtils.SUPPORTS_V6
    transition mechanism only, do not use
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.addItem(MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.Item...)
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.addScriptParam(String, Object)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.andQuery(QueryBuilder...)
    Use BoolQueryBuilder.mustNot(QueryBuilder) instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.CompressorFactory.compressor(IndexInput)
    we don't compress lucene indexes anymore and rely on lucene codecs
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.count(CountRequest)
    use Client.search(SearchRequest) instead and set size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.count(CountRequest, ActionListener<CountResponse>)
    use Client.search(SearchRequest, ActionListener) instead and set size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.client.Requests.countRequest(String...)
    use Requests.searchRequest(String...) instead and set size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.common.blobstore.support.AbstractLegacyBlobContainer.createOutput(String)
    org.elasticsearch.search.builder.SearchSourceBuilder.defaultRescoreWindowSize(int)
    use RescoreBuilder.windowSize(int) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.ShadowEngine.delete(Engine.DeleteByQuery)
    This was removed, but we keep this API so translog can replay any DBQs on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.InternalEngine.delete(Engine.DeleteByQuery)
    This was removed, but we keep this API so translog can replay any DBQs on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.engine.Engine.delete(Engine.DeleteByQuery)
    This was removed, but we keep this API so translog can replay any DBQs on upgrade.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.TermsQueryBuilder.disableCoord(boolean)
    use [bool] query instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.docs(MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.Item...)
    org.elasticsearch.search.SearchService.executeScan(ShardSearchRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.exists(ExistsRequest)
    use Client.search(SearchRequest) instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.exists(ExistsRequest, ActionListener<ExistsResponse>)
    use Client.search(SearchRequest, ActionListener) instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.client.Requests.existsRequest(String...)
    use SearchRequest instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.get.GetIndexRequest.featuresAsEnums()
    use GetIndexRequest.features() instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.filteredQuery(QueryBuilder, QueryBuilder)
    Use QueryBuilders.boolQuery() instead with a must clause for the query and a filter clause for the filter.
    org.elasticsearch.script.AbstractScriptParser.getAdditionalScriptParameters()
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.OperationRouting.hash(HashFunction, String, String)
    org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.HashFunction.hash(String, String)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.ids(String...)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.ignoreLike(MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.Item...)
    Use MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.unlike(Item...) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.ignoreLike(String...)
    Use MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.unlike(String...) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.FieldSortBuilder.ignoreUnmapped(boolean)
    Use FieldSortBuilder.unmappedType(String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.internal.FieldNamesFieldMapper.Builder.index(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.Compressor.indexInput(IndexInput)
    Used for backward comp. since we now use Lucene compressed codec.
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.CompressorFactory.isCompressed(IndexInput)
    we don't compress lucene indexes anymore and rely on lucene codecs
    org.elasticsearch.common.compress.Compressor.isCompressed(IndexInput)
    Used for backward comp. since we now use Lucene compressed codec.
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.lang(String)
    Use ScriptSortBuilder.ScriptSortBuilder(Script, String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MoreLikeThisQueryBuilder.likeText(String)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.limitQuery(int)
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.setTerminateAfter(int) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.TermsQueryBuilder.minimumShouldMatch(String)
    use [bool] query instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.missingQuery(String)
    Use QueryBuilders.existsQuery(String) inside a BoolQueryBuilder.mustNot(QueryBuilder) clause instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.notQuery(QueryBuilder)
    use QueryBuilders.boolQuery() and add a mustNot clause instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.blobstore.support.AbstractLegacyBlobContainer.openInput(String)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.orQuery(QueryBuilder...)
    Use QueryBuilders.boolQuery() instead
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.param(String, Object)
    Use ScriptSortBuilder.ScriptSortBuilder(Script, String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.script.Template.parse(XContentParser, Map<String, ScriptService.ScriptType>, ParseFieldMatcher)
    org.elasticsearch.script.Template.parse(XContentParser, Map<String, ScriptService.ScriptType>, String, ParseFieldMatcher)
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.prepareCount(String...)
    use Client.prepareSearch(String...) instead and set size to 0
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.prepareExists(String...)
    use Client.prepareSearch(String...) instead and set `size` to `0` and `terminate_after` to `1`
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.prepareTermVector()
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.prepareTermVector()
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.prepareTermVector(String, String, String)
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.prepareTermVector(String, String, String)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.queryFilter(QueryBuilder)
    Useless now that queries and filters are merged: pass the query as a filter directly.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.HasParentQueryBuilder.scoreType(String)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.HasChildQueryBuilder.scoreType(String)
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.script(String)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.script(String, ScriptService.ScriptType)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.script(String, ScriptService.ScriptType, Map<String, Object>)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.script(String, String, ScriptService.ScriptType, Map<String, Object>)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptLang()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptLang(String)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptParams()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptParams(Map<String, Object>)
    Use UpdateRequest.script(Script) instead
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.SortBuilders.scriptSort(String, String)
    Use SortBuilders.scriptSort(Script, String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptString()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.action.update.UpdateRequest.scriptType()
    Use UpdateRequest.script() instead
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.UTF8StreamWriter.setOutputStream(OutputStream)
    Replaced by UTF8StreamWriter.setOutput(OutputStream)
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder.setParams(Map<String, Object>)
    Use ScriptSortBuilder.ScriptSortBuilder(Script, String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setRescoreWindow(int)
    use SearchRequestBuilder.addRescorer(org.elasticsearch.search.rescore.RescoreBuilder.Rescorer, int) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplateName(String)
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplate(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplateParams(Map<String, Object>)
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplate(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplateType(ScriptService.ScriptType)
    Use SearchRequestBuilder.setTemplate(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.common.network.NetworkUtils.sortAddresses(List<InetAddress>)
    remove this when multihoming is really correct
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateName()
    use SearchRequest.template() instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateName(String)
    use SearchRequest.template(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateParams()
    use SearchRequest.template() instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateParams(Map<String, Object>)
    use SearchRequest.template(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateType()
    use SearchRequest.template() instead.
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest.templateType(ScriptService.ScriptType)
    use SearchRequest.template(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.termVector(TermVectorsRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.termVector(TermVectorsRequest)
    org.elasticsearch.client.Client.termVector(TermVectorsRequest, ActionListener<TermVectorsResponse>)
    org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient.termVector(TermVectorsRequest, ActionListener<TermVectorsResponse>)
    org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.DocumentMapper.Builder.transform(ScriptService, String, ScriptService.ScriptType, String, Map<String, Object>)
    Use DocumentMapper.Builder.transform(ScriptService, Script) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.MultiMatchQueryBuilder.useDisMax(boolean)
    use a tieBreaker of 1.0f to disable "dis-max" query or select the appropriate MultiMatchQueryBuilder.Type
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.ScriptSortBuilder(String, String)
    Use ScriptSortBuilder.ScriptSortBuilder(Script, String) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.analysis.StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer()
    use StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer.StandardHtmlStripAnalyzer(CharArraySet) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.TemplateQueryBuilder(String, Map<String, Object>)
    Use TemplateQueryBuilder.TemplateQueryBuilder(Template) instead.
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.TemplateQueryBuilder(String, ScriptService.ScriptType, Map<String, Object>)
    Use TemplateQueryBuilder.TemplateQueryBuilder(Template) instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.support.ValueType.ANY
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchType.COUNT
    does not any improvements compared to SearchType.QUERY_THEN_FETCH with a `size` of 0
    org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchType.SCAN
    will be removed in 3.0, you should do a regular scroll instead, ordered by `_doc`
